definition: having a quality that thrusts itself into attention, a lavishly produced performance
details:
adjective
- having a quality that thrusts itself into attention
= synonyms: prominent
- characteristic of spectacles or drama
= example: characteristic of spectacles or drama
- sensational in appearance or thrilling in effect
= synonyms: striking, dramatic
noun
- a lavishly produced performance
= example: a lavishly produced performance
